about_the_game:
Aquario is a game of fish, they live in an aquarium of yours. Please take good care of them.

You can acquire fish, feed them, upgrade your fish tank; and when time comes, sell them on the Steam Market.

# Features:

- Game

- Some fish

- The fish swim

- You can watch the fish swimming

- You can feed the fish (never forget to feed your fish)

- Fish will become sad if you don't feed them, eventually leaving your tank and becoming angels

- The fish increase in numbers over time (??), you can also buy and sell fish on the Steam Marketplace
detailed_description:
Aquario is a game of fish, they live in an aquarium of yours. Please take good care of them.

You can acquire fish, feed them, upgrade your fish tank; and when time comes, sell them on the Steam Market.

# Features:

- Game

- Some fish

- The fish swim

- You can watch the fish swimming

- You can feed the fish (never forget to feed your fish)

- Fish will become sad if you don't feed them, eventually leaving your tank and becoming angels

- The fish increase in numbers over time (??), you can also buy and sell fish on the Steam Marketplace

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: You just need a window manager on top of a system daemon to run this
  • Processor: Any 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: You might as well run it on software rendering alone
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: If your distro can run Steam then it's fine
  • Processor: MMX, SSE, SSE2, SSE3, SSSE3, SSE4.1 instruction supported Intel Core 2 Duo 1.06 GHz or AMD Athlon II 1.6 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or Vulkan 1.0 support is recommended
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 High Sierra (Update to Mojave if you can, it's faster)
  • Processor: 3rd generation Intel (Ivy Bridge) or Apple M1
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything that gives you a transparent Dock
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 11 Big Sur
  • Processor: 5th generation Intel (Broadwell) or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If using integrated graphics, just make sure you have 512MB ram free in the background
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Aquario

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD Phenom or Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Just don't forget to install drivers
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Board audio is enough
  • Additional Notes: The specs specified above are not guaranteed to bring enjoyable frame rates depending on the version of Windows, installed drivers, CPU and board revision and most importantly, background processes.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (if you want fancier graphics)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II or an Intel Haswell generation CPU (You technically need these to run Win 10/11 alone, the game needs less lol)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: A dedicated GPU is recommended to run the Windows Aero theme
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Get yourself the latest speaker with a 10-inch subwoofer if you want to have a mind blowing experience of cute fish noises

short_description: Let's face it, we all were once kids. There was a time when we wanted pets, and there was a moment when we wanted to keep a pet fish. Some of us got what they wanted; some didn't. Some cried, some forgot. Aquario is the game where you can live through this traumatic experience again, or anew.
